text.emotional: [sadness, extreme]I haven’t seen one myself, yet, I have to admit.[/sadness] [happiness, extreme]But that is what Dahu-Catching-Day is for, and I’m trying to establish it here as a community event.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} i haven't seen one myself yet i have to admit {...} but that is what dahu catching day is for {...} and i'm trying to establish it {.} here as a community event {...}
